(Original) Each one of these craters that you can see in the picture is a trace of a nuclear test at a nuclear test site in the Nevada desert, southwest of the United States of America. topComments.author: Vern Strecheniuk
topComments.comment: (TraduÃ§Ã£o do Google) Foi bastante termo o dia em que visitamos, mas o esqui de areia Ã© incrÃ­vel. O Centro de Spa & Relaxamento Area 51 Ã© o motivo de deduzir uma estrela. A equipe foi bastante militante e tratou-nos como estrangeiros. Eu tambÃ©m aconselho a nÃ£o tomar o banho de lama. NÃ³s nÃ£o sabÃ­amos que isso incluÃ­a uma casca de pele e nÃ³s realmente nÃ£o gostamos do Agent Orange Smoothie do seu Juice Bar. Eu acho que todos os seus lanches tinham gosto de ter sido nuked. Melhor para trazer seus prÃ³prios refrescos.  (Original) It was quite thermo the day we visited, but the sand skiing is amazing. The Area 51 Spa & Relaxation Center is why I deducted one star. The staff were quite militant and treated us like aliens. I would also advise against taking the mud bath. We didn't know that it including a skin peel and we really didn't enjoy the Agent Orange Smoothie from their Juice Bar. I find that all their snack food tasted like it had been nuked. Best to bring your own refreshments.
